definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Golden Week, two 7-day national holiday periods
name of various places including Gold Coast (Australian city), Gold Coast (former British colony in Africa) and Costa Daurada (area on the coast of Catalonia, Spain)
Wong Kam-po (1973-), Hong Kong champion cyclist
Wee Kim Wee (1915-2005), president of Singapore (1985-1993)
lit. in books are sumptuous houses and graceful ladies (proverb)/fig. be diligent in your studies, success and glory will follow
pinyin: shu1 zhong1 zi4 you3 huang2 jin1 wu1 , shu1 zhong1 zi4 you3 yan2 ru2 yu4
containing_words.word: 書中自有黃金屋，書中自有顏如玉

definition: Curse of the Golden Flower (2007), period drama movie by Zhang Yimou
pinyin: Man3 cheng2 jin4 dai4 huang2 jin1 jia3

definition: lit. the man has gold under his knees; fig. a man who does not easily kneel in front of others (owing to pride or moral integrity)
pinyin: nan2 ren2 xi1 xia4 you3 huang2 jin1

definition: lit. house made of gold/fig. luxurious residence

sentences.english: Another company I follow is Pediment Gold.
sentences.chinese: 另一家公司是山花我遵循黃金。

sentences.english: I don't think this show is primetime material.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這算不上是黃金時段的節目。

sentences.english: Gold section head of gold, the owner often high in cost.
sentences.chinese: 黃金地段黃金市口，業主往往要價很高。

sentences.english: Gold section head of gold, the owner often high in cost.
sentences.chinese: 黃金地段黃金市口，業主往往要價很高。

sentences.english: The company expects to produce 4.5 million ounces this year.
sentences.chinese: 安格魯黃金公司今年有望生產450萬盎司黃金。

sentences.english: The company expects to produce 4.5 million ounces this year.
sentences.chinese: 安格魯黃金公司今年有望生產450萬盎司黃金。

sentences.english: They were enticed westward by dreams of gold.
sentences.chinese: 他們被黃金夢引誘到西部。

sentences.english: I only know whether theGolden Path continues or ends.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道黃金之路是持續還是終止。

sentences.english: They traveled in quest of gold.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲尋找黃金而長途跋涉。

sentences.english: Many of the gold ornaments are melted down to be made into coins.
sentences.chinese: 很多黃金飾物回爐後鑄成了金幣。

sentences.english: Perkins recalls it as a great time to be a journalist.
sentences.chinese: 帕金斯回憶說，那是一個記者的黃金時期。

sentences.english: Curse of the Golden Flower takes place mostly within the confines of the palace itself.
sentences.chinese: 《滿城盡帶黃金甲》大部分故事發生在宮廷裏面。

sentences.english: Modifications have been made to thee-gold Account User Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 已作了更改，以電子黃金賬戶的用戶協議。

sentences.english: Bucca is a 2 year old golden retriever.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的狗狗，布卡，是一隻兩歲的黃金獵犬。
